name: Bone Pickaxe
description: Frail. After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Bone Darts
description: Range: 6. Frail: When you attempt tp wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Axe
description: Frail. Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

name: Bone Blade
description: Frail: When you attempt tp wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Dagger
description: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival. Perfect hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

name: Bone Sickle
description: Frail. After the Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Round Leather Shield
description: Add 1 (shield) to all  hit locations. Block 1: Spend (lightning) to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Hunter Whip
description: (puzzle blue)(puzzle blue) On a Perfect hit, discard 1 mood in play.

name: Rawhide Whip
description: Provoke: When you wound with this weapon, gain the priority target token.
